title: 11/15: Start or Sit (AFC Home Games) (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Phillip Lindsay is our Start of the Week (1:22) and we'll tell you who to start him over. Also, who can still break out as we approach the final weeks of the season (3:00)? Rob Gronkowski? Alex Collins perhaps? ... News and notes (6:36), rest of season rankings (10:00) as we debate Philip Rivers vs. Mitchell Trubisky vs. Andrew Luck and some young RBs, veteran WRs and talented TEs. We've also got the Startometer (16:45) for Marlon Mack, Tyler Boyd, Keenan Allen and more ... KC-LAR (26:00), PIT-JAC (33:36), MIN-CHI (40:54), CIN-BAL (46:50), TEN-IND (53:25), DEN-LAC (1:00:00) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Let's get your lineups set with the first of two Start or Sit episodes for this upcoming week. We'll look at the AFC home games plus the two prime time NFC homes on this episode.
